definitions: To perform an exercise in which one lies facing the floor and, keeping the back straight, raises one's body by pressing down on one's hands until the arms are straight, then lowers the body again.
To engage in the physical exercise of push-ups.
examples: Every morning, I do push-ups to strengthen my chest and arms.
He can do push-ups with one hand.
They do push-ups as part of their warm-up routine.
